attributes.action: Give Drake a UK citizenship for everything he has done for the UK..
attributes.background: Drake has done so much for the UK, he brought out J Hus works with certain UK artists fakes his UK accent and is always somehow in London walking about he has done more for the UK than Theresa May has altogether therefore he should be granted the rights to a UK citizenship..

rejection.details: Drake doesn't appear to have applied for British Citizenship. We're therefore not exactly sure what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
